Docs.summary: Configures the key property to use a sequence-based key value generation pattern to generate values for new entities, when targeting SQL Server. This method sets the property to be .
Docs.returns: The same builder instance so that multiple calls can be chained.
Docs.remarks: See Modeling entity types and relationships, and Accessing SQL Server and SQL Azure databases with EF Core for more information and examples.
